entry.title: https://github.com/GDQuest/learn-gdscript
entry.content: Learn Godot's GDScript programming language from zero, right in your browser, for free.

entry.title: https://github.com/Maaack/Godot-Game-Template
entry.content: Godot template with a main menu, options menus, pause menu, credits, scene loader, extra tools, and an example game scene.

entry.title: https://github.com/Maran23/script-ide
entry.content: Script-IDE is a plugin for Godot. It transforms the Script UI into an IDE like UI. Tabs are used for navigating between scripts. The default Outline got an overhaul and now shows all members of the script (not just methods) with unique icons for faster navigation.

entry.title: https://github.com/Orama-Interactive/Pixelorama
entry.content: Unleash your creativity with Pixelorama, a powerful and accessible open-source pixel art multitool. Whether you want to create sprites, tiles, animations, or just express yourself in the language of pixel art, this software will realize your pixel-perfect dreams with a vast toolbox of features. Available on Windows, Linux, macOS and the Web!

entry.title: https://github.com/Quaint-Studios/Reia
entry.content: RPG game action-adventure MMO built with Godot, Rust, and Zig.

entry.title: https://github.com/RodZill4/material-maker
entry.content: A procedural textures authoring and 3D model painting tool based on the Godot game engine

entry.title: https://github.com/TheDuckCow/godot-road-generator
entry.content: A godot plugin for creating 3D highways and streets.

entry.title: https://github.com/Zylann/godot_heightmap_plugin
entry.content: HeightMap terrain for Godot implemented in GDScript

entry.title: https://github.com/bitbrain/pandora
entry.content: Godot 4 addon for RPG data management such items, inventories, spells, mobs, quests and NPCs.

entry.content: üí¨ Create Dialogs, Visual Novels, RPGs, and manage Characters with Godot to create your Game!

entry.content: An MCP for Godot that lets you create and edit games in the Godot game engine with tools like Claude

entry.title: https://github.com/mbrlabs/Lorien
entry.content: Infinite canvas drawing/whiteboarding app for Windows, Linux and macOS. Made with Godot.

entry.content: An automatic, real-time dual-grid tileset system for Godot
